R

rejectForgivingAssignment() - Method in class mdscssControl.MDSCSSController
The rejectForgivingAssignment function is called by the MMODFRame if the operator has rejected the current assignment in the forgiving mode of control.
rejectForgivingDet() - Method in class mdscssControl.MDSCSSController
The rejectForgivingDet function is called by the MMODFrame if the operator has rejected the current detonation choice in the forgiving mode of control.
removeEntry(String) - Method in class mdscssRoot.ThreatOverviewPanel
The removeEntry function is called by the MMODFrame when a threat has been marked as destroyed.
removeThreat(String) - Method in class mdscssModel.MissileDBManager
The removeThreat function removes a threat from the database, given a specific identifier.
resetView() - Method in class mdscssRoot.InterceptorOverviewPanel
The resetView function is called when the MDSCSS looses connection to the subsystems.
resetView() - Method in class mdscssRoot.SMCDPanel
The resetView function is called when the MDSCSS looses connection to the subsystems.
resetView() - Method in class mdscssRoot.TheatreMapPanel
The resetView function is called when the MDSCSS looses connection to the subsystems.
resetView() - Method in class mdscssRoot.ThreatOverviewPanel
The resetView function is called when the MDSCSS looses connection to the subsystems.
run() - Method in class mdscssControl.ControlThread
The main control thread.
run() - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODPoller
The Run function tells the MMODFrame, and all of its components, to access the MissileDBManager and update their visible states.
